text: Sano naga jwalijose mwa achiŵammakwenu ali antisile kuja kumakafili (ni m'bilasisye mahari genu nambo akanyisye), kaneka ni mpatile chipanje (cha makafilio chachaŵajilwe kwauchisya pa achiŵammakwao ŵaŵatisile kapena chinchipatile petala lyangondo), basi mwapani aŵala ŵaatisile achiŵammakwao yakulandana ni yaŵatosile (pakulombela). Soni mun'jogopani Allah Ajula jwankuŵa nkunkulupilila
